scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/workers && bun build --minify --target=bun --sourcemap --outdir dist src/index.ts && bun build --minify --sourcemap --target=bun --outdir dist src/workers/runner.ts && tsc && cp src/lib dist -r && mv dist/index.js dist/src/ && mv dist/runner.js dist/workers/
